content.text: Welcome to a 'festa di compleanno', an Italian birthday party! We'll learn how to congratulate the host, mingle with guests, and leave politely.

data.tip: The 'au' sounds like the 'ow' in the English word 'cow'.

content.title: Congratulating the Host
content.setting: You've arrived at your classmate Luca's birthday party. You see him and go to congratulate him.

conversation_flow.title: Ask for a glass
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Oh, grazie! Non dovevi. Le bevande sono là. C'è anche Sofia, una mia amica.

content.text: Great! Now let's join a conversation. A simple 'Piacere, io sono...' (Nice to meet you, I'm...) is the perfect way to introduce yourself.

data.tip: The 'ce' sound is like 'che' in the English word 'check'.

content.title: Joining a Conversation
content.setting: You see Sofia, the guest from the drinks table, talking to someone else. You decide to join them.

extract_info.user_name: Extract the user's name from their message

conversation_flow.title: Ask how they know the host, Luca
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Piacere, {user_name}! Io sono Sofia, e lui è Marco.

conversation_flow.title: Explain how you know Luca
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Io conosco Luca perché è un collega. E tu?

conversation_flow.title: Respond to Marco
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Ah, l'università! Anche io conosco Luca dall'università!

content.text: Excellent. Now it's time to leave. Let's learn a few phrases to exit a conversation and the party gracefully.

content.title: Leaving the Party
content.setting: It's time to go. First, politely leave your current conversation, then find Luca to say goodbye.

conversation_flow.title: Politely exit the conversation with Sofia and Marco
Tell Luca you have to leave
Thank Luca for the party
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Ah, peccato. Beh, grazie per il regalo!

conversation_flow.title: Say goodbye
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Grazie a te per essere venuto/a. A presto!
